siteSubTitle: Make your own graph by entering an expression:

docs.average: aggregate average operation to be used over a range of data
docs.cases: dataset for the total number of confirmed cases up to the given day
docs.day: indicates you would like to access data for the current day on the slider
docs.deaths: dataset for the total number of deaths up to the given day
docs.first: indicates you would like to access data for the first day in the dataset
docs.last: indicates you would like to access data for the last day in the dataset
docs.max: aggregate max operation to be used over a range of data
docs.min: aggregate min operation to be used over a range of data
docs.newcases: dataset for the number of new cases on the given day
docs.newdeaths: dataset for the number of new deaths on the given day
docs.sum: aggregate sum operation to be used over a range of data
